content:
Actually, the mask I was drying went missing,
fell into the river,
and got pushed up by a school of fish...

content:
You found me, <color=#d3b037>{Pnickname}</color>!
I've been playing hide and seek all day,
And you only just found me now!
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Bouncing up and down on the rooftops,
Maybe I'll bounce all the way to the sky!
Tee-hee-hee~hee!
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
I often imagine lifting my house with balloons,
but I worry it might fall from mid-air,
so I've decided to turn it into a bouncy house instead!
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Good day to you, my dear traveler!
As you can probably tell,
I'm not very good at catching bugs or fishing,
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
Many horror stories actually come from real life.
For instance, that "water monster" 
with the creepy huge face that everyone was talking about the other day by the river,
info: 闲聊-白天（7-18）闲聊-1003乐福_单一闲聊

content:
So, whenever I want to observe those tiny creatures,
I head to the Omni-Gallery.
And before I know it, I've spent the whole afternoon there.
